description:
Detects execution of "certutil" with the "addstore" flag in order to install a new certificate on the system.
Adversaries may install a root certificate on a compromised system to avoid warnings when connecting to adversary controlled web servers.
author: oscd.community
@redcanary
Zach Stanford @svch0st
false_positives: Help Desk or IT may need to manually add a corporate Root CA on occasion. Need to test if GPO push doesn't trigger FP
name: New Root Certificate Installed Via Certutil.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\certutil.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"CertUtil.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\/addstore*" OR "*\-addstore*") AND process.command_line.text:"*root*")
